Name: Web Spice Purple World
About the game: The second part is not super popular game. The planet's been attacked again, you're using memes again, winning and all that, yay. Become a master in the fight against evil, use all your Arsenal, and show that your home planet is worth it to protect it. The game is a challenging arcade game in which you defend your planet from invasion by destroying wave after wave as you move forward. Please understand that the game is made in a parody form. Features: * A parody of several already iconic Igors * Strange bonuses and solutions from developers *High level of complexity *Enough levels that would play enough and not get bored * Meeting with the boss
